effect.x_y: Raises the target’s Special Attack by one stage, then confuses it.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Raises the target’s Special Attack by one stage, then confuses it.

short_effect.x_y: Raises the target’s Special Attack by one stage and confuses the target.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Raises the target’s Special Attack by one stage and confuses the target.

flavor_text.x_y: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also raises the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also raises the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
